alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:06PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Big Horn, northeastern Stillwater, northeastern Carbon, Yellowstone, southwestern Musselshell and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 505 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles north of Columbus to 12 miles south of Fort Smith. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Hardin, Laurel, Lodge Grass, Lockwood, Worden, Fort Smith, Crow Agency, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Ballantine, Busby, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Pompeys Pillar, and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
